trans-unit.source: Frenzied Goblin
trans-unit.target: Frenzied Goblin

trans-unit.source: Whenever Frenzied Goblin attacks, you may pay {R}. If you do, target creature can't block this turn.
trans-unit.target: Whenever Frenzied Goblin attacks, you may pay {R}. If you do, target creature can't block this turn.

trans-unit.source: The upside to not thinking about the consequences is that you'll always surprise those who do.
trans-unit.target: The upside to not thinking about the consequences is that you'll always surprise those who do.

trans-unit.source: Disdainful Stroke
trans-unit.target: Disdainful Stroke

trans-unit.source: Counter target spell with mana value 4 or greater.
trans-unit.target: Counter target spell with mana value 4 or greater.

trans-unit.source: "You are beneath contempt. Your lineage will be forgotten."
trans-unit.target: "You are beneath contempt. Your lineage will be forgotten."

trans-unit.source: Hordeling Outburst
trans-unit.target: Hordeling Outburst

trans-unit.source: Create three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.
trans-unit.target: Create three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.

trans-unit.source: Kolaghan goblins rush into battle to satisfy their desire for violence as well as their desire not to be eaten.
trans-unit.target: Kolaghan goblins rush into battle to satisfy their desire for violence as well as their desire not to be eaten.

trans-unit.source: Suspension Field
trans-unit.target: Suspension Field

trans-unit.source: When Suspension Field enters the battlefield, you may exile target creature with toughness 3 or greater until Suspension Field leaves the battlefield. (That creature returns under its owner's control.)
trans-unit.target: When Suspension Field enters the battlefield, you may exile target creature with toughness 3 or greater until Suspension Field leaves the battlefield. (That creature returns under its owner's control.)

trans-unit.source: Abzan Beastmaster
trans-unit.target: Abzan Beastmaster

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, draw a card if you control the creature with the greatest toughness or tied for the greatest toughness.
trans-unit.target: At the beginning of your upkeep, draw a card if you control the creature with the greatest toughness or tied for the greatest toughness.

trans-unit.source: His beasts move the great siege towers of the Abzan across the endless sands.
trans-unit.target: His beasts move the great siege towers of the Abzan across the endless sands.

trans-unit.source: Frost Walker
trans-unit.target: Frost Walker

trans-unit.source: When Frost Walker becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.
trans-unit.target: When Frost Walker becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.

trans-unit.source: "As the clans carved out their territories, we saw allies where the Mardu saw only obstacles."\n—Yasova Dragonclaw
trans-unit.target: "As the clans carved out their territories, we saw allies where the Mardu saw only obstacles."\n—Yasova Dragonclaw

trans-unit.target: Path to Exile

trans-unit.resname: F15·7 | Path to Exile | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Exile target creature. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: Exile target creature. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

trans-unit.target: Serum Visions

trans-unit.source: Draw a card. Scry 2.

trans-unit.resname: F15·9 | Orator of Ojutai | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Orator of Ojutai
trans-unit.target: Orator of Ojutai

trans-unit.resname: F15·9 | Orator of Ojutai | Card Text
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may reveal a Dragon card from your hand. Defender, flying When Orator of Ojutai enters the battlefield, if you revealed a Dragon card or controlled a Dragon as you cast this spell, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may reveal a Dragon card from your hand. Defender, flying When Orator of Ojutai enters the battlefield, if you revealed a Dragon card or controlled a Dragon as you cast this spell, draw a card.

trans-unit.source: Ultimate Price
trans-unit.target: Ultimate Price

trans-unit.source: Destroy target monocolored creature.
trans-unit.target: Destroy target monocolored creature.

trans-unit.source: "He's paid his price. Now you pay mine."
trans-unit.target: "He's paid his price. Now you pay mine."

trans-unit.source: Roast
trans-unit.target: Roast

trans-unit.source: Roast deals 5 damage to target creature without flying.
trans-unit.target: Roast deals 5 damage to target creature without flying.

trans-unit.source: The wave of lava seared cloth from skin, skin from flesh, and flesh from bone.
trans-unit.target: The wave of lava seared cloth from skin, skin from flesh, and flesh from bone.

trans-unit.source: Anticipate
trans-unit.target: Anticipate

trans-unit.source: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
trans-unit.target: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

trans-unit.source: "You thought I wouldn't see that coming?"
trans-unit.target: "You thought I wouldn't see that coming?"
